cyclone.name: BARRY
cyclone.current_location: about 75 miles S of Morgan City, Louisiana
cyclone.trajectory: Moving slowly WNW, expected to turn northwest then north and make landfall on the south-central Louisiana coast before tracking inland up the Mississippi Valley
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: south-central Louisiana coast near Intracoastal City–Morgan City

weather_observation.watch_coast: Hurricane and Tropical Storm Watches extend from the Mouth of the Mississippi River to Cameron LA and eastward to the MS/AL border
weather_observation.warning_coast: Hurricane Warning from Intracoastal City to Grand Isle LA; Tropical Storm Warning from Mouth of the Pearl River to Grand Isle and Intracoastal City to Cameron LA
weather_observation.impacted_coast: North-central Gulf Coast from the Louisiana coast eastward to coastal Mississippi and Alabama
weather_observation.wind: Occasional gusty winds below tropical-storm force possible, peak 20–30 mph
weather_observation.rainfall: Light to moderate rain bands possible, generally 1–2 inches
weather_observation.other_hazards: None anticipated that would significantly disrupt port operations
